Class Article

java.lang.Object
Articles.Article
public class Article extends Object
Represents an article within a topic

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      getName splits the path to get the last element, which is the name of the file
      Returns:
      The name of the file

    • read

      public void read(boolean lower) throws Exception
      Reads the file and stores the contents in plainTextContents and arrayListContents Optionally, converts the contents to lowercase
      Parameters:
      lower - - Whether to convert the contents to lowercase
      Throws:
      Exception - - If the file cannot be read or if the file does not exist

    • process

      public void process() throws Exception
      Processes the contents of the article Removes punctuation and stop words Gets the unique words
      Throws:
      Exception - - If the file cannot be read or if the file does not exist
